li.label: borg
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a member of the borg collective. {PAWN_pronoun} will seek to assimilate all forms of life. Resistance is futile.

li.label: borg hivemind
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a member of the collective borg hivemind. {PAWN_pronoun} has access to the near limitless intellectual capacities of the borg. As such, {PAWN_pronoun} is extremely resistant to any affect on mood - borg are, essentially emotionless.

li.label: nanite proshetics
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef}, on initial assimilation, was fitted with a number of basic prosthetic and cybernetic improvements to their organic body. This has resulted in a more efficient work rate.
